activities: comScore, Inc, transfers European employee data to the United States for the purposes of administering payroll and benefits. In addition, comScore may contract with third party vendors to append offline data with data received from members of comScore’s panels.  While certain PII may be required to perform the data append, the third party vendor is not allowed to use the data for any other purpose and is required to destroy all data following the append.  The combined data is then anonymized and used by customers of comScore who purchase market research.
corpofftitle1: Chief Privacy Officer, Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: comScore, Inc. is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
